/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the bright sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars and buses can be seen in motion on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
